item.title: Financial Analytics
item.description: About Loan default prediction is one of the most critical and crucial problem faced by financial institutions and organizations as it has a noteworthy effect on the probability of these institutions. Problem Statement A company wants to automate the loan eligibility process(real time) based on customer detail provided while filling online application form. These details are Gender, Marital status, Education, Number of dependents, Income, Loan amount, Credit history etc.
